title: WTB- T206 Hal Chase w/ Old Mill back
author: Tobacco&Gum

posts.post_title: WTB- T206 Hal Chase w/ Old Mill back
posts.post_content:
Looking for either pink portrait, blue portrait, white cap, or dark cap with an OM back.

VG/EX condition or worse, graded or raw. Beaters or trimmed are OK

Thanks!

-VJM

Just a bump on this one... I have a blue portrait 40 OM that I offered up if I can get a replacement (same pose/grade) in Piedmont/Sweet Cap.  Anyone have one so we can work out a three way transaction here?

I have this one on eBay.  I can sell it for $145 shipped if it works for you. :D:D:D
